snippet: In an update to her USA Inc. report presented at an investor conference last week, Mary Meeker, a former top analyst at Morgan Stanley, argued that the country's fiscal problems had only gotten worse.
abstract: In an update to her USA Inc. report presented at an investor conference last week, Mary Meeker, a former top analyst at Morgan Stanley, argued that the country's fiscal problems had only gotten worse.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Meeker's Address on the State of USA Inc.
